title: Why Can't I See Telehealth Availability On My Appointment Widget?
body:
If your Telehealth Appointment Types or Sessions are not appearing on the widget.
  There are a few things you need to check :
1. You will need to make sure the Provider is configured for Coviu.
2. Your appointment Type has been set to Community and Telehealth.
3. Your Appointment Session has been set to Community.
